pages.title: Grass Snake
pages.text: The grass snake ($(o)Natrix natrix$()), sometimes called the ringed snake or water snake, is a Eurasian non-venomous colubrid snake.$(br2)It is often found near water and feeds almost exclusively on amphibians.$(br2)The barred grass snake, Natrix helvetica, was split off as a separate species in 2017.
